projectData.title: Portfolio
projectData.description:
A static website built to showcase my skills and projects. This website was built from scratch using a template you can find from UI8.

I decided to rebuild my portfolio from scratch because my old portfolio was made by using a pre-made Bootstrap template and I wanted to make it myself since this site is for showcasing my coding skills.
projectData.techDescription: The choice of technologies for this project was not easy. I wanted to make sure the website was fast and easy to maintain. Wanting to use React, I tried both Astro & Next.js.

nextProjectData.title: TrueMatch
nextProjectData.description:
A mobile application that allows users to find & match with other users based on their astrology signs. If two users like each other, they can chat.

This project was a real challenge for me. When starting it, I was used to work with Firebase and had little experience with REST APIs. I hit some limitations with Firebase and had no choice but to build a full REST API connected to a database to supply the mobile app.

 This project is probably the best self-learning experience I had. I was able to learn a lot about full-stack development & develop a passion for it.
nextProjectData.techDescription: The technologies used for this project changed a lot during the development. From starting with only a backend-as-a-service to a full-stack project.
